title: Cryptograph
description: This is a fascinating word puzzle game based on cryptograms. In the game, it is necessary to decipher words using numerical encoding. The gameplay is designed for sequential completion of levels, where each level is a quote or motivational saying. The game allows you to train your attention. A great way to have a pleasant time.
instructions: You need to decipher quotes that consist of words. The deciphering is done letter by letter. Each letter corresponds to a number. It is necessary to insert letters into the free slots, relying on the numerical encoding of letters that are already revealed on the game field. Some letters will need to be deciphered from the context. To insert a letter into a slot, you need to tap on the slot and select a letter, using the keyboard directly on the game field.

title: Dragon Escape
description: The cute dinosaur wants to reach the exit by eating Sandwich in the area protected by robots. If you want to help him, try to pass the levels by using laser traps without entering the robots' field of vision.
instructions: Use WASD or ARROW KEYS control the Dinosaur.

title: Knife Up 3D
description: Knife Up 3D is a casual game that tests your reflexes. Feel the rhythm, don't damage the ball and beat your opponents. You can unlock new skins with the rewards you get by passing the levels. It's time to test your reflexes, so if you find it interesting, don't forget to share it with your friends and join in! Have fun!
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Stickman Jailbreak Story
description: An exciting puzzle game in which the player will have to help stick make a daring escape from prison. Stick found himself in a sinister prison, from which there is no way out, except for various ingenious paths, hidden objects and puzzles. The player will explore the various rooms of the prison, paying attention to every small detail and examining objects in search of key clues. Each room is filled with riddles, traps and various items that can be used to escape.
instructions: The main task of the player is to choose the right items and use them correctly on the screen to go through all the challenges that stand in the way of freedom. Incorrect choices can lead to fatal consequences, so the player must be careful and attentive.

title: Toilet Pin
description: Join the daily story of the toilet boy in the monster letter world. This new pin pulling game is for you. Let's explore Alphabet Lore with extraordinary characters! In the land of evil letters, you will have a chance to meet various amazing characters and powers of them: evil B ready to punch in your face, Angry C biting with sharp teeth, boring F with a gun, Crazy Z with fire, monster D who loves lava ....
instructions: GAMEPLAY ● Your goal is to help the boy get to the toilet or help him get the toilet paper ● Pull the pin in the right order to defeat Alphabet lore monsters with rock, ice or fire ● Collect the coin to buy more clothes and stuffs for the little boy

title: Block Puzzle - Jewel Forest
description: An addictive block puzzle game that helps train your eyes and brain. It is a combination between the Tetris and Jewels game styles.
instructions: Drag the jewel blocks to the desired places, to form full jewel lines (horizontal or vertical) in order to blast them.

title: Save My Pet Party
description: Cute pets need protection, would you like to help them? Draw protection walls for bees coming from different locations in each level and stop them. In levels you find difficult, you can get hints or skip the level directly. You can play Save My Pet Party game in 1 Player or 2 Player modes.
instructions: In single player game mode: Use "MOUSE" and "LEFT-CLICK" to draw. In 2 player game mode: Player 1: Use "W,A,S,D" and "E" to draw. Player 2: Use "ARROW KEYS" and "L" to draw.

title: Tap & Go Deluxe
description: Embark on an exhilarating adventure in this arcade runner game! Your goal is simple: Tap to move forward or change direction. Navigate your way through the path, aiming for higher scores as you pave the way!
instructions: Tap or click with the right mouse button to change the direction.

title: Egg Hunt Mania
description: Get your basket ready and save all the eggs you can from a terrible fate. Make sure to empty a full basket into the store. Watch out for the rising quota for eggs each day!
instructions: Catch as many eggs as you can with your basket. Sell the eggs in the shop and use the money for upgrades and multipliers to sell eggs faster. Survive the day by catching at least the minimum amount of eggs required.

title: Frogga
description: Guide Frogga across a busy road in this exciting frogger-style game. Tap to make Frogga jump forward, timing your movements carefully to avoid the oncoming traffic. Each level presents new challenges with faster cars and trickier obstacles, keeping you on your toes. Collect bonuses and power-ups along the way to help Frogga on his journey.
instructions: Help Frogga jump across the road and avoid getting squashed in this frogger-style game.

title: Bus Stop Color Jam
description: A great passenger color sorting game begins with the Bus Stop Color Jam game! Sort the passengers by their color and get them into the buses. Once the buses are full, they will move to the destination point. Use power-ups when you need them. Over 400+ game levels are waiting for you! An entertaining Bus Stop Jam is beginning!
instructions: Use MOUSE and LEFT-CLICK Click over the passengers to start them to move.

title: Best Friends Puzzle
description: Hop on an epic adventure with the Bug Heroes and help them defeat the menacing birds of the forest! Strategically link at least three symbols of the same colour to empower the Heroes with their special perks. Explore the lush green forests with your bug friends.
instructions: Connect as many symbols of the same colour as possible to complete levels and defeat enemy birds. Gather xp bottles and upgrade your bug heroes so they have even stronger perks.

title: Sliding Gems
description: Embark on an enchanting journey of matching gems! Dive into a realm filled with shimmering jewels, tactical maneuvers, and irresistible puzzle trials. Slide and place vibrant gems to unveil newfound powers. Confront challenges with diverse boosters to overcome obstacles and achieve higher scores.
instructions: Shift the blocks horizontally, clearing them upon completing a row. Blocks without support beneath will descend. With each move, the lower blocks ascend, ending the game upon reaching the top.

title: Runic Block Collapse
description: Welcome to 'Runic Block Collapse'! Tap any block to clear connected blocks in a chain reaction. Removing one block costs 250 points. Removing 2 or more blocks earns points, with larger groups earning more per block. Reach the target score to advance. If you fail, start over. Enjoy endless fun!
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Save The Sheep
description: Save The Sheep offers an immersive mental challenge as you step into the shoes of a shepherd. Relentless wolves have invaded your flock, seeking to feast on your precious sheep. Safeguard your flock by strategically placing wooden stakes to separate them from the predators. Experience the electrifying thrill of rescuing sheep and demonstrate your unmatched intellect in this captivating game.
instructions: Slide to draw

title: Lulus Fashion World
description: Welcome to Lulu’s Fashion World. Can you battle to become the top fashion designer? Collect stars, progress through cities and events. Choose from clothes you own from plenty categories. Style outfits your way and save them to use whenever you like. The combinations of clothing and makeup are at your fingertips to experiment and create unique trends that could become the new fashion trend. Experiment with new looks and create a fad. So, are you ready to be the new fashion icon ?
instructions: Choose a style and dress for the occasions. Become the best designer in Lulu’s Fashion World.

title: Wheel of Bingo
description: Wheel of Bingo has two parts. Part 1: Spin the wheel to match bingo numbers. To help the player, colored marks are drawn on the wheel to indicate their bingo numbers. For every match, the player gains points and a colored ball to be used in part 2. For a complete bingo line, many extra balls are awarded. Part 2: Drop balls to match colors in plinko. The point values shown at the bottom of the screen are base values, but are multiplied if there is a successful color match (GREEN MATCH X 5).
instructions: Part 1: Use the buttons labelled ' SPIN LEFT' and 'SPIN RIGHT' located below the wheel. Hold the button to power up the spin, which is indicated by the 'spin gauge' above the button. Part 2: Click and hold to position the ball at the top of the the plinko board. Release to launch the ball.

title: Pin Detective
description: Welcome to Pin Detective - Mystery Mansion! A rich woman mysteriously vanished in a lavish mansion that was covered by the rumors of ghosts and dangerous monsters. A talented detective is committed to uncovering the mystery. By pulling the pin, you can collect clues that enlighten the truth. What happens to the billionaire? Why do the biological laboratory and so many alien animals exist in this mansion? Let’s use your brain to solve the puzzle to find it out.
instructions: ● Pull the pin to explore the mansion and uncover the mystery. ● Just a mistake can put you in danger and lose your life. ● Use coins to renovate the mansion and buy clothes.

title: Hidden Object Great Journey
description: “Hidden Object: Great Journey” is an engaging game that invites players to scour various themed levels for cleverly concealed items. With multiple modes, a lot of challenges, and a treasure trove of objects to find, this game promises endless fun for hidden object enthusiasts. Sharpen your observation skills and embark on a delightful search with every play!
instructions: Tap on hidden objects to reveal them. Tap on the differences between two pictures. Find the connection between two objects. Find the missing pieces.

title: Ramp Car Jumping
description: A one-touch race, fly, crash game that sends you flying through the air in your car before you smash into everything in your path! Ramp Car Jumping is the most unusual challenge you’re likely to face this year. You literally jump off a ski jump in a car! Crazy speed Insane smashes Maximum heat And so many smashes, you’ll get crash burnout! Challenge your friends to an ol’ fashioned smash off! What’s the biggest crash you can imagine? Try now and watch it happen!
instructions: Keyboard: WASD/Arrow keys, space, enter Mouse

title: Phrasle Master
description: Guess words of wisdom, proverbs and sayings in a fun brainteaser. Tap the words to make a phrase, and try to solve a riddle in 5 attempts using the color hints. As you progress, hidden phrases get longer, so you will need to apply all your logic and puzzle-solving skills to cope with the solve the riddles. Besides, such word games let you expand your vocabulary and learn foreign languages in a fun way. So, prove your skill as you decipher witty quotes and proverbs in a free word game online.
instructions: Tap the words to make a sentence, and decipher the phrase using color prompts. The words in their position are highlighted green. The words used in the sentence elsewhere are marked yellow. Gray words are not used in the riddle. Please, mind that words may be used twice in a phrase.

title: PacXon New Realms
description: Lay hold of the land in PacXon New Realms, the long-awaited sequel to the 2007 classic PacXon Deluxe. Explore 192 challenging levels across 4 different locations. Dodge enemies as you seize chunks of territory in this thrilling twist on the original arcade adventure. Enjoy a revamped user interface, a fresh soundtrack, and nostalgic pixel art animations. Plus, unlock 4 - 6 unique character skins per location. Get ready for a captivating journey filled with new features and fun.
instructions: Create walls by running past the pellets, and close the loop to seize the area inside. In every level, you must capture at least 80% of the field to win. Check the progress bar at the top to see how you’re doing. Beware of ghostly mines - if they touch an unfinished wall, you lose a life! Each enemy follows a specific movement pattern. Look carefully and weave between them without getting hit! Keep an eye out for sweet treats; each of these power-ups provides a unique temporary boost.

title: Fish Feeding
description: Nobody can stop you, but you are not the only fish in the sea: you will have to avoid the vicious sharks that wander in the deepest, darkest depths, looking for a nice little fish to eat! See how high you can score!
instructions: Touch or Click to invert the rotation

title: Bubbly Lab
description: Bubbly Lab is a physics puzzle game where you have to catch all the adorable bubbles in the laboratory. Use a super strong vacuum cleaner to get the bubbles into the flask. Use your logic to move lab items to help you get bubbles. Solve interesting puzzles in this fun and unique game!
instructions: PC Controls Move mouse = move vacuum cleaner position Hold left-click = turns on the vacuum cleaner Mobile Controls Slide left joystick = moves the vacuum cleaner Hold right button = turns on the vacuum cleaner

title: Police Car Line Driving
description: Police Car Line Driving is a cool and addictive 3D car-avoiding arcade game. You have to chase unauthorized vehicles and drive as far as you can for higher score records. Each vehicle will give you an extra 100 scores right away. You have to dodge the bombs, other vehicles will do the same. If you hit them, you will lose the game immediately. Your current score and best score will be shown on the settlement page. If you want to improve your current score, you can restart and try again.
instructions: On PC and Mobile Tap and swipe = move the police car

title: Kung-Fu Little Animals
description: In this game you will become the new assistant of the Great Master. Your task is to teach funny and dexterous animals the art of kung fu. With simple clicks, you will train your newly minted students so that they become worthy successors of the Great Master's work. Passing the game, you will discover new funny animals, as well as new beautiful and unusual locations. Join the kung fu team and have fun teaching the little animals martial arts!
instructions: Let's take a closer look at the world of martial arts, in which animal heroes from oriental fairy tales will become our guides. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it. If you want to speed up the game, then use the available bonuses, but do it wisely. The achieved result can be saved as a PNG image at any time.

title: Max Mixed Cocktails
description: Do you want to become a master mixologist? Create cocktails by blending ingredients at the bar. Choose your ingredients, mix them skillfully, and sample the concoction. You'll reach a delightful conclusion by discovering the perfect recipe. Utilize clues in the collections to unlock different endings.
instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

title: Harbor Operator
description: As the harbor master and operator, navigate incoming ships to the correct docks. Tap and drag to draw routes into the docks, while taking into account the unloading time, speed, and other visual indicators. Control beautiful ships such as yachts, super yachts, container ships, oil tankers and more. Plan your routes to avoid any shipping accidents.
instructions: Navigate ships into the correct docks. Avoid shipping accidents.

title: Fish Eat Grow Mega
description: The mega grow is beginning with the mega fishes in the huge ocean on a great exciting adventure! New types of fish and a huge ocean are waiting for you in this chapter. Swimming in the more dangerous places of the ocean must be exciting. Pick your fish and embark on this adventure with your friend in 2 player game mode. Grow as much as you can and become the king fish of the ocean!
instructions: Player 1: Move: W, A, S, D Boost: C Player 2: Move: ARROW KEYS Boost: L

title: Merge Brick Breaker
description: Welcome to Merge Brick Breaker, the ultimate fusion of ball merging and brick-breaking action! Get ready to embark on a thrilling adventure that challenges your strategic skills and reflexes.
instructions: Click/touch to aim and release to shoot.

title: Race Clicker
description: Race Clicker is an action-packed idle clicker racing game that'll pump up your adrenaline. Customize, upgrade, and speed your way to victory. Each click pushes your limits, every upgrade unveils new possibilities, and each race dares you to click faster. Leave rivals in the dust and satisfy your need for speed with endless excitement. Start your engines and hit the track now!
instructions: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

title: Fill & Sort Puzzle
description: Fill & Sort Puzzle is a cozy puzzle game where players have to sort, stack, and pleasantlarrange household items while watching for a naughty cat who likes to make things messy! Many small details need to be paid attention to in the levels. For example, when organizing the shoe rack, don’t forget to clean the dirty shoes before storing them. Do you need a hint? Watch the video for tips.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Striped Fruit - Watermelon Land
description: Welcome to the enchanting world of Striped Fruit that full of strategy and fun. Here, you'll become a watermelon maker extraordinaire, mastering the art of fruit merge to create the juiciest combinations on the board. As a merge master, you'll tap, drop, and combine fruits in a strategic dance. The challenge? To reach your way to the top, the first step is to merge 2 melons to create a watermelon - the King of Fruits. Can you merge 2 watermelons to smash them out? Let's check it out!
instructions: Drag & Drop identical fruits to create new, bigger one.

title: House Deep Clean Sim
description: House Deep Clean Sim is a home-themed cleaning game with a strong sense of experience. It has 9 scenes for you to clean, which are fence, sculpture, trampoline, pool, robot, fountain, ground, car, and dining table. Not only does it have a rich scene, but it also has everything you need for a clean game, such as full 3D effects, resizable nozzle size, and the ability to move around at will. Try it if you are interested. Have fun.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Idle Lawnmower
description: In Idle Lawnmower, embrace the tranquility of tending to your virtual lawn, earning gold with each satisfying swath cut. Utilize your earnings to upgrade your lawnmower, enhancing efficiency and earning potential in this idle game of grassy growth and financial gain.
instructions: Manage your virtual lawn and earn gold to upgrade your lawnmower.

title: Blind Boat Shooting Master
description: Craft your raft and navigate through the colorful world. Take aim and fire to vanquish foes and gather riches. Featuring a unique comic book aesthetic and a diverse roster of over 30 characters, Raft Wars provides endless hours of fun for players of all skill levels. Dive into engaging turn-based battles against other pirates, thieves, and raft fighters as you journey across various lands and discover new territories. Dont miss out on the excitement - join the adventure today!
instructions: Slide to play

title: Panda Running
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure through the bamboo forest in Panda Running, an endless runner game where you guide a cute panda through various obstacles like traps, tree stumps, and boulders. Collect power-ups along the way to protect and boost yourself, experiencing non-stop excitement in this adrenaline-fueled journey.
instructions: Join the adorable panda on a thrilling adventure through the bamboo forest in Panda Running, where you must jump over traps and obstacles while collecting power-ups for protection and boosts.

title: Lazy Workers
description: The employees in the office have started slacking off and everyone is asleep. As the boss, you need to get the office back up and running. To do this, use your mouse and send employees to rows of desks. Move workers so they do not bump into each other. Your job will get a little more difficult with each level. If you cannot pass the level, you can use the option to skip the level.
instructions: Move employees one by one using the Mouse.

title: Idle Factory Domination
description: Embark on a journey of industrial dominance in Idle Factory Domination. Click on cells to purchase land, invest in businesses and resources to initiate production, and steadily expand your empire to unlock new territories, all while amassing wealth and asserting your manufacturing prowess.
instructions: Conquer the industrial landscape in Idle Factory Domination by strategically purchasing land, investing in businesses, and expanding your empire to unlock new territories and maximize profits.

title: Avoid The Spikes
description: Jump and dodge all the spikes to avoid dying, get score for each touch of the wall and get gems while jumping to then be able to buy new skins in the in-game store in which there are 22 to unlock in exchange for the gems obtained.
instructions: -Touch the screen to move the ball -Collide to right wall change left direction -Collide to left wall change right direction -Purchase 20 new skins for gems obtained in game

title: Word Guess Game
description: Are you good at guessing a word from provided letters in random order? Here is a word-guessing puzzle game with arcade play rules. There are four different modes with more letters from four to seven. More difficult modes have more time for you to use. Keep calm and make a new reword!
instructions: Tap the letters

title: Jump Girl 3D
description: Jump Girl 3D is an addictive casual jumping game. It's time to stack your own tofu towers and help the lively girl climb the delicious bouncy tofu trampoline tower. Beware of obstacles that appear from both sides and try to stand in the middle for a smoother and safer ride. Try to challenge every move and unleash the girl's acrobatic skills! Go, Tofu Girl!
instructions: Click or tap

title: Bonnie Fitness Frenzy
description: Bonnie decides to get her figure in perfect shape for the summer season. Join the girl in her adventures in the gym, where you will perform a variety of exercises to help her burn off extra calories. After intensive training, Bonnie will start applying makeup. And finally, it's time to dress up! Help us choose fashionable and elegant sports outfits to emphasize the fitness style of our heroine. Join Bonnie on her exciting journey to the perfect figure and style!
instructions: Together with the heroine of the game, we go to the gym to get in shape after the winter. After completing sports activities, we do makeup and hairstyle. We complement the image with an outfit that will favorably emphasize the result achieved in the gym. The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: 3D Ball Balancer
description: 3D Ball Balancer is a fun 3D rolling ball game. Control the ball to roll on the floating bridge. There are obstacles all over the floating bridge, including broken bridges, ramps, single-plank bridges, etc. Not only do you have to control the direction of the ball, but you also have to control the speed of the ball. How far you can go? Have a try!
instructions: Slide to move

title: Home Island
description: Looking for a family adventure game? Try our Home Island: Family Pin free puzzle games about village life in paradise island! Pull the pin to solve the puzzle, follow the story and enjoy adventures on the island. On the adventure for discovering the new island, a family cruise ship plane had to face an accident because of the bad weather. The father has gone missing, but the mother and their daughter luckily survived and got to a strange island.
instructions: GAMEPLAY ● Pull the pin to get the wood, matchbox, food and other items needed to survive on an island. Just one small mistake can make the mom and her daughter lose their lives. ● Unlock new facilities ●Earn money to build a dream land and make it home

title: Hobo Speedster
description: Hobo Speedster is an exciting motorcycle platform BMX game featuring 2D cartoon graphics. Your mission? Keep the motorcycle balanced until you reach the finish line. As you earn coins and diamonds, upgrade your current bike at the motorcycle settlement, purchase 3 more motorcycles from the Shop, and unlock 4 additional riders in the Decorate section. Ready for a personal challenge? Explore various maps and aim to complete all 7 tasks for extra rewards!
instructions: On PC A or Left arrow = back D or Right arrow = forward On Mobile Press and hold the accelerator buttons on the screen

title: College Girls Team Makeover
description: Try our new fashionista app "College Girls Team Makeover". Here you can dress up 5 high school best friends. They are the most popular school girls and always together. Everyone would like to be in their girl squad! They manage to be the most stylish girls in school, because they have their own fashion stylist and that’s you! You can control their whole look from the color of their skin and eyes to hairstyle and makeup. More than 1000 items of clothes and accessories are at your disposal!
instructions: Use left mouse click to change outfit.

title: King Kong Kart Racing
description: Get ready for an exhilarating kart racing experience in King Kong Kart Racing, where you'll navigate thrilling tracks, outmaneuver opponents, and collect fuel packs to extend your runway, all while immersing yourself in a fun cartoon theme, complete with simple controls for both desktop and mobile users and a great racing soundtrack.
instructions: Race through dynamic tracks in King Kong Kart Racing, overtaking opponents, riding speed lanes, and collecting fuel packs to extend your runway in this action-packed kart racing game.

title: Hyper Knight
description: The apocalypse began and ancient creatures emerged from their graves. You are people's only hope. Put on your armor and start fighting. -Collect the souls of monsters and earn money. -Find new weapons and armors. -Discover your magical powers. -Find a companion and it will accompany you. -Save different towns, encounter unlimited enemies. -Destroy the bosses that threaten the world. Why are you waiting? Come on, grab your sword and join us.
instructions: Kill the enemies you encounter and clear the entire room to move to the next room. After killing all the enemies, you can advance to the next level through a portal that opens to the next level. As you kill enemies, you collect souls. You can sell the souls to the Soulkeeper to convert them into gold, which you can use to strengthen yourself. After some time, an arena will open where you can compete in one-on-one battles with other warriors.

title: Clownfish Pin Out
description: Clownfish Pin Out is an interesting and cute puzzle game, you need to help one little fish escape from a dangerous place. Tap the pin to make the waterfall to the fish and avoid the lava. Think before you move, or you will lose. Come on!
instructions: Tap to play
